Package blf.blockchains.hyperledger.helpers

Interface HyperledgerInstructionHelper

public interface HyperledgerInstructionHelper
This functional helper interface holds several methods, mainly with parsing purposes, for the different hyperledger specific instructions.

  • Method Details

    • parseAddressListCtx

      static List<String> parseAddressListCtx(HyperledgerProgramState hyperledgerProgramState, BcqlParser.AddressListContext addressListCtx)
      Tries to parse an address List.
      Parameters:
      hyperledgerProgramState - The current ProgramState of the BLF.
      addressListCtx - The context of the address list.
      Returns:
      Address names as list of Strings

    • parseSmartContractFilterCtx

      static org.antlr.v4.runtime.misc.Pair<String,List<HyperledgerQueryParameters>> parseSmartContractFilterCtx(HyperledgerProgramState hyperledgerProgramState, BcqlParser.SmartContractFilterContext smartContractFilterCtx)
      Tries to parse the Smart Contract Filter input in the manner the manifest requested.
      Parameters:
      hyperledgerProgramState - The current ProgramState of the BLF.
      smartContractFilterCtx - The context of the Smart Contract Filter.
      Returns:
      Pair of the contract address/name and a List of HyperledgerQueryParameters.

    • parsePublicVariableQuery

      static HyperledgerQueryParameters parsePublicVariableQuery(BcqlParser.SmartContractQueryContext smartContractQueryCtx)
      Tries to parse the Smart Contract Query as a Public Variable Query.
      Parameters:
      smartContractQueryCtx - The context of the Smart Contract Query.
      Returns:
      HyperledgerQueryParameters class including all parsed parameters.

    • parsePublicFunctionQuery

      static HyperledgerQueryParameters parsePublicFunctionQuery(HyperledgerProgramState hyperledgerProgramState, BcqlParser.SmartContractQueryContext smartContractQueryCtx)
      Tries to parse the Smart Contract Query as a Public Function Query.
      Parameters:
      hyperledgerProgramState - The current ProgramState of the BLF.
      smartContractQueryCtx - The context of the Smart Contract Query.
      Returns:
      HyperledgerQueryParameters class including all parsed parameters.

    • parseLogEntryFilterCtx

      static org.antlr.v4.runtime.misc.Triple<String,List<org.antlr.v4.runtime.misc.Pair<String,String>>,List<String>> parseLogEntryFilterCtx(HyperledgerProgramState hyperledgerProgramState, BcqlParser.LogEntryFilterContext logEntryCtx)
      Tries to parse the Log Entry Filter input in the manner the manifest requested.
      Parameters:
      hyperledgerProgramState - The current ProgramState of the BLF.
      logEntryCtx - The context of the log entry filter.
      Returns:
      A Triple including the event name, a list of type and name pairs and a List of contract names/addresses.

    • parseBlockFilterCtx

      static org.antlr.v4.runtime.misc.Pair<BigInteger,BigInteger> parseBlockFilterCtx(HyperledgerProgramState hyperledgerProgramState, BcqlParser.BlockFilterContext blockCtx)
      Tries to parse the Block Filter input in the manner the manifest requested.
      Parameters:
      hyperledgerProgramState - The current ProgramState of the BLF.
      blockCtx - The context of the block filter.
      Returns:
      A Pair of a starting and ending block number.

    • parseBlockNumber

      static BigInteger parseBlockNumber(HyperledgerProgramState hyperledgerProgramState, BcqlParser.BlockNumberContext blockNumberContext)
      Tries to parse a Block Number.
      Parameters:
      hyperledgerProgramState - The current ProgramState of the BLF.
      blockNumberContext - The context of the block number.
      Returns:
      A block number as BigInteger.

    • queryVariableNameString

      static String queryVariableNameString(HyperledgerProgramState hyperledgerProgramState, String variableName)
      Queries for a String variableName.
      Parameters:
      hyperledgerProgramState - The current ProgramState of the BLF.
      variableName - The variableName which is queried.
      Returns:
      The mapped value to the variableName.

    • bytesToHexString

      static String bytesToHexString(byte[] bytes)
      Converts a bytes array to a hex String.

      Inspired from: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/9655181/how-to-convert-a-byte-array-to-a-hex-string-in-java

      Parameters:
      bytes - Input bytes array
      Returns:
      Output hex String

    • readPrivateKeyFromFile

      static PrivateKey readPrivateKeyFromFile(String path)
      Reads a hyperledger private key from a file.
      Parameters:
      path - Directory specification for the file.
      Returns:
      The hyperledger private key.
